explanation: Shows how Maglev builds catch contexts and wires exception message state. The CreateCatchContext bytecode allocates a catch context object inlined in Maglev and records scope info. The SetPendingMessage bytecode is lowered to a SetPendingMessage IR node whose codegen updates the isolate’s pending message slot, integrating with exception handling; various Maglev node codegens define exception handler and lazy deopt points to integrate with handlers.
